data.message: Why does Coca Cola taste different in other countries. I've recently come back from Bulgaria and Coca Cola tastes like cardboard even out of a can yet I get back to England and the first thing I did was crack a cold can of Coca Cola

replies.message: Water. If you see a can that was made in Ireland, that too tastes different to English coke. It's all down to the water they put in it from the area it's made in.
Baz Horn that's rather interesting who knew it would make such a difference
Apparently Mexican coke is the best (yes, I'm still talking about the drink) because they can still use pure cane sugar in theirs.
